ygData.subject: Evercrack is the Best!!
ygData.msgSnippet: New club member here. I had a tough time getting into the game at first. I chose a newer server (Xev) and a gnome mage. There were never that many people in my
ygData.messageBody:
New club member here. I had a tough time getting
into the game at first. I chose a newer server (Xev)
and a gnome mage. There were never that many people
in my zone (Steamfont), i couldn't summon a pet yet,
and a found myself running madly from spiderlings all
the time. The only good thing about being a gnome is
that there are TONS of low level quests in Ak'Anon.
This made it bearable. (My wood elf druid char. gets
only one lame quest, but you can do a couple of the
other class quests that are ok). Plus, there's not
really any point in grouping at newbie levels. BUT, when
I got to about lvl 5, things changed and I headed
off to GFay - to orc hill, CB, and off to BB for some
new views. <br><br>Every level gets better and
better, and there are more quests, items, spells, and
trade skill abilities as you keep going. I was in a
great CB throne room group that took down Emp Crush and
D'Vinn - my pet sacrificed itself so that we all could
regroup and finish the job. 2 of the group members were
in the same guild, and immediately asked me to join.
There have been no limits to the help i've gotten
since.<br><br>I'd love to hear from anyone from Xev!!!! I have a
lvl16 druid and lvl 16 mage. Honestly, i like playing
the druid better - but now that i'm at level 16 with
the mage, i can tinker and do spell research - which
seems fun. <br><br>This site seems like it's for people
like me - Ever wish you sould give a /tell to your
friend when you're next to any annoying person? When I
go to a party, I always want to "/who all" to see
who's there. And are any of you married?? Oh, man - my
wife is not a gamer, and i've learned that when we
made plans to visit her mother, she does not care if
there is a weekend long guild war. <br><br>Hope to hear
from you all!!! <br><br>Xela of Xev<br>Wood elf druid
of the 16th season<br><br>Serrafina of Xev<br>Gnome
Mage of the 16th season
